Name: HUNTER BRICK BALL
About the game: Perfect time killer! Hunter brick ball - these are hundreds of stages, the most exciting gameplay. While shooting balls, try to break as many bricks as possible before they sink to the bottom. Break the golden brick and get the ball! Make an endless chain of balls! Very easy to play, but very difficult to achieve high results! Features To get a new level you need to break the golden brick Endless gameplay Windowed mode How to play Hover up to throw balls and break bricks. Choose the right angle of attack Destroy the golden brick to add the ball and move to a new level A golden brick hides from you
